This week you will learn about geospatial analysis and creating more exciting tables.

There is also optional material on writing functions

## **Learning Outcomes**

**By the end of the week you will be able to:**

1.  Know how to analyse geospatial data in R.

2.  Use the sf package and ggplot to plot data in a map.

3.  Use the gt package to creating more exciting tables.

#### **Structure of this week's materials**

1.  Introduction to Geospatial Data in R with sf and ggplot: 2 readings including practicals and code samples.

2.  Creating more exciting tables: 7 readings with code samples. 1 optional video.

3.  OPTIONAL: Writing and applying functions and a functions quiz.
